title: Prince of Tennis: The Two Samurai, The First Game
title_en: The Prince of Tennis: The Two Samurai, The First Game
title_jp: 劇場版 テニスの王子様 二人のサムライ The First Game
synopsis: The regular players from Seigaku participates in an exhibition game aboard a cruise ship. However, they discover that the event is being run by a corrupt millionaire heavily involved in illegal gambling and betting, who demands that they lose the match on purpose. To add to the confusion, one of the players on the rival team introduces himself as Ryoma's brother.
